verses.text: \w In|strong="H1732"\w* you, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, I take refuge. Let me never \w be|strong="H1732"\w* disappointed. Deliver me \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness.

Bow down \w your|strong="H3068"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Deliver|strong="H6403"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* speedily. \w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strong rock, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* defense \w to|strong="H3068"\w* save \w me|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H3467"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* name’s sake lead \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* guide \w me|strong="H5337"\w*.

Pluck \w me|strong="H5148"\w* out \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H4686"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* laid secretly \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5148"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4686"\w*.

\w Into|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* hand \w I|strong="H3588"\w* commend \w my|strong="H3318"\w* spirit. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* redeem \w me|strong="H3318"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, God \w of|strong="H3318"\w* truth.

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* hate those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* regard lying vanities, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving kindness, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H8104"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* seen \w my|strong="H8104"\w* affliction. \w You|strong="H8104"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* known \w my|strong="H8104"\w* soul \w in|strong="H3068"\w* adversities.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* shut \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w into|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* enemy. \w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* set \w my|strong="H7200"\w* feet \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* large place.

\w Have|strong="H3027"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5975"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w distress|strong="H3027"\w*. \w My|strong="H3027"\w* eye, \w my|strong="H3027"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* body waste away \w with|strong="H3027"\w* grief.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* spent \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3708"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* years \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sighing. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* fails \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w wasted|strong="H6244"\w* \w away|strong="H6244"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* adversaries \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* become \w utterly|strong="H3782"\w* contemptible \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* neighbors, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* horror \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* acquaintances. \w Those|strong="H3782"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* saw \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* street fled \w from|strong="H2416"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* forgotten \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hearts \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dead \w man|strong="H3605"\w*. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* broken pottery.

\w For|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* heard \w the|strong="H1961"\w* slander \w of|strong="H3627"\w* many, terror \w on|strong="H1961"\w* every side, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3820"\w* conspire together against \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w they|strong="H3820"\w* plot \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* away \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* God.”

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* times \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand. Deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* persecute \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* face \w to|strong="H6256"\w* shine \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* servant. \w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* loving kindness.

Let \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* disappointed, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* called \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked \w be|strong="H5650"\w* disappointed. Let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* silent \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Sheol.\f + \fr 31:17 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f*

Let \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lying lips \w be|strong="H3068"\w* mute, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous insolently, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* pride \w and|strong="H3068"\w* contempt.

Oh how great \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* goodness, which \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H8193"\w* laid \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* fear \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, which \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H8193"\w* worked \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6662"\w*!

\w In|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* \w shelter|strong="H2620"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* plotting \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*. \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w keep|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w secretly|strong="H6845"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dwelling \w away|strong="H5048"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* strife \w of|strong="H1121"\w* tongues.

Praise \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w has|strong="H7379"\w* shown \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* marvelous loving kindness \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strong city.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* haste, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H2617"\w* off \w from|strong="H3068"\w* before \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.” \w Nevertheless|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* petitions \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cried|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

Oh love \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, all \w you|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* holy ones! \w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* preserves \w the|strong="H8085"\w* faithful, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* fully recompenses \w him|strong="H6963"\w* who behaves arrogantly.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* strong, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w take|strong="H6213"\w* courage, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
